content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court case in ljubljana the case involves two parties referred to as the plaintiff and the defendant the purpose of the case is to determine the ownership shares of two real estate properties with a total value of 41000 eur between the exspouses the court has declared that one property will be divided equally between the parties while the other property will also be divided equally the plaintiff has been ordered to pay the defendants legal costs amounting to 203167 eur the legal procedure lasted for 1 year 8 months and 18 days the specific parties involved are not mentioned the text also explains the process of lodging an appeal in a legal case including the necessary requirements and time limits
